cast.name: 爱德阿多·加布瑞尔利尼 Edoardo Gabbriellini
艾琳娜·蕾多娜希奇 Elena Radonicich

awards:
第72届威尼斯电影节(2015)
　　费比西奖(国际影评人联盟奖) 地平线单元及国际影评人周奖(提名) 阿德里亚诺·瓦雷里奥

　　第20届釜山国际电影节(2015)

writer.name: 阿德里亚诺·瓦雷里奥 Adriano Valerio

director.name: 阿德里亚诺·瓦雷里奥 Adriano Valerio

introduction: Bari, a city caught in the relentless economic crisis. Ivo is an agronomist, but the lack of opportunities pushes him to accept a job in the fertile region of Banat in Romania. Clara has just ended a relationship and is about to lose her job at the Bari harbor. Ivo and Clara meet by chance and seem to immediately understand each other. They spend only one night together before Ivo's departure, but that is enough to create a bond and wanting to meet again. When Clara visits him in Romania, they fall in love. But is exile their only way to happiness? Written by 30. Venice International Film Critics' Week
